message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend less than $80. Would you be willing to consider a price of $70?
I understand you're looking to spend less than $80, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. Would you be interested?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I'm not willing to go as low as $90, but I can see you're serious about buying. I'll meet you at $120, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $80 and $120, which would be $100. Would you be willing to accept that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. I'll give you a slight concession, but I need to make at least $130 to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $125?
